scripts.actual: export BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && resume export ./private/${BRANCH}/resumes/abdelbadie_omar.pdf -r resume_phone.json --theme actual
scripts.gitlab: export BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && resume export ./private/${BRANCH}/resumes/abdelbadie_omar.pdf -r resume_phone.json --theme gitlab
scripts.kendall-modern: export BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && resume export ./private/${BRANCH}/resumes/abdelbadie_omar.pdf -r resume_phone.json --theme kendall-modern
scripts.makedir: export BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && mkdir -p ./private/${BRANCH}/resumes/; mkdir -p ./private/${BRANCH}/cover_letters/
scripts.setup: npm run add_phone && npm run makedir
scripts.publish: npm run setup && npm run actual
